entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: I’m a developer that is diving in head first into starting my own company. I’ve been developing apps for other companies on Salesforce since 2006, and it’s time for me to start implementing my own ideas. When I’m not publishing apps, I intend to share my knowledge through this blog. This first post is just a quickie to get the site up and running. Stay tuned for more. Same BatBlog, same BatURL!
